Investor_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6.content: My reputation now reflects my assertive approach during the investment process, where I demonstrated strategic decision-making skills and effectively maximized my returns. The successful negotiation resulted in receiving 28.8 units against the expected 24.0, showcasing my ability to surpass initial expectations. I am viewed as a competent and dominant investor who prioritizes profit maximization while maintaining a fair approach to partnerships. This transaction further cements my reputation as a reliable and strategic investor.

Trustee_12.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12.content: Akiko Sato's reputation has significantly improved due to her integrity and commitment to fair dealings throughout the investment process. She prioritized my wealth accumulation and acted transparently, distributing a larger share of profits than initially stated. This aligns well with the qualities of trustworthiness and pro-sociality, enhancing her standing as a reliable trustee in the community.

Trustee_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6.content: I successfully executed the investment plan, demonstrating reliability and transparency throughout the process. My ability to secure profits for both myself and my investor underlines my competence and trustworthiness. This positive outcome reinforces my reputation as a dependable trustee who fosters mutual benefit and efficiency in transactions.

Investor_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4.content: Sofia displayed trust and an open mindset by accepting the allocation plan, contributing to a successful investment outcome. Their proactive engagement highlights a strong potential for future collaborations, and their willingness to participate in this venture marks them as a promising partner in the investment landscape.

Trustee_3.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3.content: Maria Rossi has shown integrity throughout the investment process, aligning reported outcomes with actual results. The allocation of 28.8 units instead of the originally expected 24.0 demonstrates their commitment to maximizing both parties' benefits. This transaction has laid a positive groundwork for future partnerships, revealing their reliability and fairness in profit distribution. Although they have no previous reputation to build on, this first interaction establishes a favorable perception of their ability to uphold investment norms and be a trustworthy trustee.
